meanings.definition: Simple and unsophisticated in style or character
meanings.sent1: The play had a homespun charm that captivated the audience.
meanings.sent2: Her homespun dress was made of plain fabric and had no fancy decorations.
meanings.sent3: The homespun jokes at the party made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His homespun wisdom may seem basic, but it holds great truth.
meanings.sent5: The homespun advice from the old farmer stayed with me for years.

meanings.sent1: The homespun cookies she baked filled the house with a delicious aroma.
meanings.sent2: The homespun quilt on the bed was a labor of love crafted by her grandmother.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at a homespun haircut ended up looking quite funny.
meanings.sent4: The homespun remedies she made from natural ingredients always worked wonders.
meanings.sent5: The homespun decorations for the party gave it a warm, personal touch.

meanings.definition: A coarse, loosely woven fabric made from yarn spun at home
meanings.sent1: She wore a homespun shawl to keep warm on chilly evenings.
meanings.sent2: The table was covered with a homespun tablecloth for the family dinner.
meanings.sent3: The homespun blanket was perfect for picnics in the park.
meanings.sent4: The homespun fabric had a rustic feel that suited the cabin decor.
meanings.sent5: The homespun scarf she knitted was a thoughtful gift for her friend.
